newsitem.title: MALAYSIA: KL tin down 19 cents to 13.79 rgt/kg.
newsitem.headline: KL tin down 19 cents to 13.79 rgt/kg.

text.p: Malaysia's tin price fell 19 cents to 13.79 ringgit ($5.48) a kg on Monday, in tandem with a lower close on the London Metal Exchange (LME) on Friday.
"The LME was down, and the market here just followed through," said a trader.
The fall extended the fresh 26-month low in prices set on Friday.
Turnover fell to 71 tonnes from 121 on Friday. Initial bids were only for 14 tonnes against offers for 121. The local price premium against London narrowed to $75 from $135 previously.
